VIII.iv.2.B.3.a
.
Record Group 389, Records of the PMGO:Â  Master Indexes
Record Group 389
,
Records of the Office of the Provost Marshal General (PMGO)
, contains master indexes from the International Red Cross that identify American FPOWs during WWII.
The records available include:
26 volumes of records on German POWs
6 volumes of records on Japanese POWs, and
1 volume of records on POWs interned in other countries.
The FPOWs are listed by
name
service number, and
branch of service.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B - Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Service Records
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B
